title: Input schema of the Discord Server Directory scraper

startUrls.title: Start URLs
startUrls.description: Directory or listing pages to start crawling from (e.g. https://top.gg/servers, https://disboard.org/servers).

maxRequestsPerCrawl.title: Max Requests per Crawl
maxRequestsPerCrawl.description: Maximum number of requests the crawler will perform.

useBrowser.title: Use Playwright (for JS-heavy pages)
useBrowser.description: If true, use PlaywrightCrawler to render JS-driven directories (slower but more accurate).

followInternalOnly.title: Follow internal links only
followInternalOnly.description: If true, only follow links within the same host as each start URL.

checkInvites.title: Validate invite links
checkInvites.description: If true, perform an HTTP check on discovered invite links to detect expiry or redirects (may increase request count).

concurrency.title: Concurrency
concurrency.description: Number of parallel requests (CheerioCrawler). Lower for politeness.
